definitions.title: Def
definitions.body: [[קמח]] (√ of foll.; As. ḳamû, perh. crush, grind; kêmu (= ḳemû ?), flour; NH = BH, so Targum [[קִמְחָא]], Syr. qamh.o0; Vulg. Ar. qamh.un wheat; Eth. qamh.: produce, fruit, vegetables; cf. Egypt. kamāḥ, Bondi:77, ḳmḥ, a kind of bread, Erman:ZMG xivi (1892), 120).
